verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon אַיֶּ֥לֶת <S%H365><s%> upon Aijeleth הַשַּׁ֗חַר <S%H7837><s%> Shahar מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אֵלִ֣י <S%H410><s%> My God אֵ֭לִי <S%H410><s%> my God לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> why עֲזַבְתָּ֑נִי <S%H5800><s%> why hast thou forsaken רָח֥וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me? [why art thou so] far מִֽ֝ישׁוּעָתִ֗י <S%H3444><s%> from helping דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> me [and from] the words שַׁאֲגָתִֽי׃ <S%H7581><s%> of my groaning

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God אֶקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> I cry י֭וֹמָם <S%H3119><s%> in the daytime וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have no תַעֲנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> but thou hearest וְ֝לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> not and in the night season וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have no דֽוּמִיָּ֥ה <S%H1747><s%> and am not silent לִֽי׃
וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You קָד֑וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> But thou [art] holy י֝וֹשֵׁ֗ב <S%H3427><s%> [O thou] that inhabitest תְּהִלּ֥וֹת <S%H8416><s%> the praises יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
בְּ֭ךָ בָּטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> trusted אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> Our fathers בָּ֝טְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> in thee they trusted וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵֽמוֹ׃ <S%H6403><s%> and thou didst deliver

אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you זָעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> They cried וְנִמְלָ֑טוּ <S%H4422><s%> unto thee and were delivered בְּךָ֖ בָטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> they trusted וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and were not בֽוֹשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> in thee and were not confounded

וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I תוֹלַ֣עַת <S%H8438><s%> But I [am] a worm וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and not אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and no man חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> a reproach אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of men וּבְז֥וּי <S%H959><s%> and despised עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רֹ֭אַי <S%H7200><s%> All they that see יַלְעִ֣גוּ <S%H3932><s%> me laugh me to scorn לִ֑י יַפְטִ֥ירוּ <S%H6362><s%> separate בְ֝שָׂפָ֗ה <S%H8193><s%> the lip יָנִ֥יעוּ <S%H5128><s%> they shake רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the head

גֹּ֣ל <S%H1556><s%> He trusted אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> on the LORD יְפַלְּטֵ֑הוּ <S%H6403><s%> [that] he would deliver יַ֝צִּילֵ֗הוּ <S%H5337><s%> him let him deliver כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <S%H2654><s%> him seeing he delighted בּֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Yet אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> who גֹחִ֣י <S%H1518><s%> But thou [art] he that took מִבָּ֑טֶן <S%H990><s%> me out of the womb מַ֝בְטִיחִ֗י <S%H982><s%> thou didst make me hope עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׁדֵ֥י <S%H7699><s%> breasts אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> [when I was] upon my mother's

עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָשְׁלַ֣כְתִּי <S%H7993><s%> I was cast מֵרָ֑חֶם <S%H7358><s%> upon thee from the womb מִבֶּ֥טֶן <S%H990><s%> belly אִ֝מִּ֗י <S%H517><s%> from my mother's אֵ֣לִי <S%H410><s%> thou [art] my God אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> be not תִּרְחַ֣ק <S%H7368><s%> Be not far מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> at כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for צָרָ֣ה <S%H6869><s%> from me for trouble קְרוֹבָ֑ה <S%H7138><s%> [is] near כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there עוֹזֵֽר׃ <S%H5826><s%> for [there is] none to help

סְ֭בָבוּנִי <S%H5437><s%> have compassed פָּרִ֣ים <S%H6499><s%> bulls רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> Many אַבִּירֵ֖י <S%H47><s%> me strong בָשָׁ֣ן <S%H1316><s%> [bulls] of Bashan כִּתְּרֽוּנִי׃ <S%H3803><s%> have beset me round

פָּצ֣וּ <S%H6475><s%> They gaped עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and פִּיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> upon me [with] their mouths אַ֝רְיֵ֗ה <S%H738><s%> lion טֹרֵ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> [as] a ravening וְשֹׁאֵֽג׃ <S%H7580><s%> and a roaring

כַּמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> like water נִשְׁפַּכְתִּי֮ <S%H8210><s%> I am poured out וְהִתְפָּֽרְד֗וּ <S%H6504><s%> are out of joint כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַצְמ֫וֹתָ֥י <S%H6106><s%> and all my bones הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> my heart כַּדּוֹנָ֑ג <S%H1749><s%> is like wax נָ֝מֵ֗ס <S%H4549><s%> it is melted בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst מֵעָֽי׃ <S%H4578><s%> of my bowels

יָ֘בֵ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> is dried up כַּחֶ֨רֶשׂ ׀ <S%H2789><s%> like a potsherd כֹּחִ֗י <S%H3581><s%> My strength וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <S%H3956><s%> and my tongue מֻדְבָּ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth מַלְקוֹחָ֑י <S%H4455><s%> to my jaws וְֽלַעֲפַר־ <S%H6083><s%> me into the dust מָ֥וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death תִּשְׁפְּתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H8239><s%> and thou hast brought

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for סְבָב֗וּנִי <S%H5437><s%> have compassed כְּלָ֫בִ֥ים <S%H3611><s%> For dogs עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> me the assembly מְ֭רֵעִים <S%H7489><s%> of the wicked הִקִּיפ֑וּנִי <S%H5362><s%> have inclosed כָּ֝אֲרִ֗י <S%H3738><s%> dig יָדַ֥י <S%H3027><s%> my hands וְרַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> and my feet

אֲסַפֵּ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> I may tell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַצְמוֹתָ֑י <S%H6106><s%> all my bones הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They יַ֝בִּ֗יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> they look יִרְאוּ־ <S%H7200><s%> [and] stare בִֽי׃

יְחַלְּק֣וּ <S%H2505><s%> They part בְגָדַ֣י <S%H899><s%> my garments לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and for לְ֝בוּשִׁ֗י <S%H3830><s%> upon my vesture יַפִּ֥ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> among them and cast גוֹרָֽל׃ <S%H1486><s%> lots

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> from me O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> be not תִּרְחָ֑ק <S%H7368><s%> But be not thou far אֱ֝יָלוּתִ֗י <S%H360><s%> O my strength לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> thee to help חֽוּשָׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> haste

הַצִּ֣ילָה <S%H5337><s%> Deliver מֵחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> from the sword נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> from the power כֶּ֝֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> of the dog יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <S%H3173><s%> my darling

ה֭וֹשִׁיעֵנִי <S%H3467><s%> Save מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> mouth אַרְיֵ֑ה <S%H738><s%> me from the lion's וּמִקַּרְנֵ֖י <S%H7161><s%> me from the horns רֵמִ֣ים <S%H7214><s%> of the unicorns עֲנִיתָֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> for thou hast heard

אֲסַפְּרָ֣ה <S%H5608><s%> I will declare שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְאֶחָ֑י <S%H251><s%> unto my brethren בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst קָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation אֲהַלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1984><s%> will I praise

יִרְאֵ֤י <S%H3373><s%> Ye that fear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַֽלְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> him all ye the seed יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כַּבְּד֑וּהוּ <S%H3513><s%> glorify וְג֥וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> him and fear מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of Him כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> him all ye the seed יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בָזָ֨ה <S%H959><s%> For he hath not despised וְלֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> Nor שִׁקַּ֡ץ <S%H8262><s%> nor abhorred עֱנ֬וּת <S%H6039><s%> the affliction עָנִ֗י <S%H6041><s%> of the afflicted וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִסְתִּ֣יר <S%H5641><s%> neither hath he hid פָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> his face מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וּֽבְשַׁוְּע֖וֹ <S%H7768><s%> from him but when he cried אֵלָ֣יו <S%H413><s%> about שָׁמֵֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> unto him he heard

מֵ֥אִתְּךָ֗ <S%H853><s%> תְֽהִלָּ֫תִ֥י <S%H8416><s%> My praise בְּקָהָ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> [shall be] of thee in the great נְדָרַ֥י <S%H5088><s%> my vows אֲ֝שַׁלֵּ֗ם <S%H7999><s%> I will pay נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <S%H3373><s%> before them that fear

יֹאכְל֬וּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat עֲנָוִ֨ים ׀ <S%H6035><s%> The meek וְיִשְׂבָּ֗עוּ <S%H7646><s%> and be satisfied יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> they shall praise יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD דֹּ֣רְשָׁ֑יו <S%H1875><s%> that seek יְחִ֖י <S%H2421><s%> shall live לְבַבְכֶ֣ם <S%H3824><s%> him your heart לָעַֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> for ever

יִזְכְּר֤וּ ׀ <S%H2142><s%> shall remember וְיָשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> All the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the world וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> shall worship לְ֝פָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> and all the kindreds גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD'S הַמְּלוּכָ֑ה <S%H4410><s%> For the kingdom וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <S%H4910><s%> and he [is] the governor בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> among the nations

אָכְל֬וּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֨וּ ׀ <S%H7812><s%> and worship כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All דִּשְׁנֵי־ <S%H1879><s%> All [they that be] fat אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon earth לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before יִ֭כְרְעוּ <S%H3766><s%> shall bow כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יוֹרְדֵ֣י <S%H3381><s%> all they that go down עָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> to the dust וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot חִיָּֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> him and none can keep alive
זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> A seed יַֽעַבְדֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve יְסֻפַּ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> him it shall be accounted לַֽאדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> to the Lord לַדּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> for a generation

יָ֭בֹאוּ <S%H935><s%> They shall come וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and shall declare צִדְקָת֑וֹ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> unto a people נ֝וֹלָ֗ד <S%H3205><s%> that shall be born כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> that he hath done
